column4: any chance you use Ubuntu with ham radio?  I'm wondering specifically about stuff that directly interfaces with a rig like a logger or satellite tracker.
Not personally, but two months ago there was a whole issue on it from Linux Journal.
figures.  Normally I use FreeBSD, but this UNR is working pretty well, so I was goign to give it a chance.
Yeah, I hear ya. :-)  I'm a FBSD guy myself.
